member.name: T:Calendar.Models.Event
member.summary: Class which represents event scheduled in calendar

member.name: P:Calendar.Models.Event.EndDate
member.summary: The end date of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.Models.Event.StartDate
member.summary: The start date of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.Models.Event.WholeDay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event is valid for whole day. If is equal to true then period defined for this event starts at date defined by and time defined as 00:00:00 and event ends at date defined by and time defined as 23:59:59

member.name: M:Calendar.Providers.RepetitionFactory.CreateAndInit(Calendar.Models.Repetitions.RepetitionPeriod)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Repetition based on passed Initialize sub properties if needed

member.name: M:Calendar.Providers.WeekDaysFactory.CreateInitialListOfWeekDays(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates initial list of selectable week days.
member.param: True if actual day must be selected.
member.returns: The new initial list of week days.
